column5: I haven't been around much lately work has been just crazy, one week I actually managed 83 hours so I haven't had the boat in the water for a few weeks. I did manage however to get out on a charter, I took my parents my wifes parents and my wife and son out of Erieau with Trophy Taker Charters. Once again I was completely impressed with the quality service we received from Jeremy. We were a bit late and my mom had a little trouble with the waves so I decided not to tourture her any more and call it a day early so we only fished about 4 hours total. In that 4 hours we did manage 17 walleye and 5 rainbows and a whole lot of fun. It was a great day on the water and i can't wait till next weekend to get back out with the guys from work on another charter with Jeremy.I only got this one picture back at the dock the waves were a little to big to have the camera out on the water.
Well there sure is some big smiles and happy faces,looks like everyone had a blast and caught some real nice fish,great report & group pic....cheers
Man thats a pretty good day on the water and some nice fish. Congrats
Wow everyone looks very happy no disapointment there.Thanks for the Happy pic  MTP
